resources:
DebuggableTool Could not find the given class name ("%s") Tool does not extend AbstractTool Tool has no default constructor Tool default constructor is private Unknown error Usage:
 # export CLASSPATH=/path/to/your/apk
 # app_process / name.kevinross.tool.debuggable.DebuggableTool [debuggable tool options] -- com.example.cls [arguments]
 
 where the -- is only needed if parameters for DebuggableTool are needed (for example, to wait for the debugger)
